select from np_goods_info i left join (select sum(goods_info_num) as count, np_order_goods.goods_info_id from np_order_goods where order_id in (select order_id from np_order where order_status='3')group by goods_info_id) o on o.goods_info_id=i.goods_info_id where i.goods_id in (select goods_id from np_goods where cat_id = #{catId}) and i.goods_info_delflag='0' and i.goods_info_added='1' order by o.count desc limit 0,#{rowCount}
